item.title: [317 delta] when someone gets all skills 99 it announces to server [317 delta]
item.dc:creator: @abtekk abtekk
item.description:
@abtekk wrote:

andykent:

its better if it says 99 in all stats tho

No, he means if you changed your code to look at the players total level and THEN announce what you want it to, it will make your code smaller.

item.title: [317 delta] when someone gets all skills 99 it announces to server [317 delta]
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

Hello, I need help… I am trying to make it so when someone gets everyskill 99 it announces to server, this is what i was trying to use to do that… but it’s not working.
} else if(playerLevel[0] == 99 && (playerLevel[1] == 99) && (playerLevel[2] == 99) && (playerLevel[3] == 99) && (playerLevel[3] == 99) && (playerLevel[4] == 99) && (playerLevel[5] == 99) && (playerLevel[6] == 99) && (playerLevel[7] == 99) && (playerLevel[8] == 99) && (playerLevel[9] == 99) && (playerLevel[10] == 99) && (playerLevel[11] == 99) && (playerLevel[12] == 99) && (playerLevel[13] == 99) && (playerLevel[14] == 99) && (playerLevel[15] == 99) && (playerLevel[16] == 99) && (playerLevel[17] == 99) && (playerLevel[18] == 99) && (playerLevel[19] == 99) && (playerLevel[20] == 99)) {
yell("[Server]: " + playerName + " has gotten 99 in all skills!");
}

Read full topic
